import React from 'react'; const Dashboard = () => { const stats = [ { icon: 'üìù', value: '24', label: 'Total Blogs', trend: '+12%', trendUp: true }, { icon: 'üíº', value: '15', label: 'Total Projects', trend: '+5%', trendUp: true }, { icon: 'üë•', value: '2.4K', label: 'Monthly Visitors', trend: '+23%', trendUp: true }, { icon: '‚úÖ', value: '92%', label: 'Success Rate', trend: '+3%', trendUp: true } ]; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, icon: 'fas fa-edit', text: 'Getting Started with React Hooks was published', time: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, icon: 'fas fa-code', text: 'E-commerce Platform was updated', time: '5 hours ago' }, { id: 3, icon: 'fas fa-user-plus', text: 'New team member was registered', time: '1 day ago' } ]; const quickActions = [ { icon: 'fas fa-plus', label: 'New Blog Post' }, { icon: 'fas fa-project-diagram', label: 'Add Project' }, { icon: 'fas fa-chart-bar', label: 'View Analytics' }, { icon: 'fas fa-cog', label: 'Settings' } ]; const systemStatus = [ { service: 'Web Server', status: 'Online' }, { service: 'Database', status: 'Online' }, { service: 'API Services', status: 'Online' }, { service: 'File Storage', status: 'Online' } ]; const performance = [ { metric: 'CPU Usage', value: 45 }, { metric: 'Memory', value: 68 }, { metric: 'Storage', value: 32 } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Dashboard

Welcome to your admin dashboard

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}

{stat.value}

{stat.trend}

{stat.label}

))}
{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Left Column */}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.map(activity => (

{activity.text}

{activity.time}
))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
{/* Right Column */}
{/* System Status */}

System Status

{systemStatus.map((item, index) => (
{item.service}
{item.status}
))}
{/* Performance */}

Performance

{performance.map((item, index) => (
{item.metric} {item.value}%
))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
